property.name: linkText
property.value: View @{(lookupResults eq null or lookupResults.size() lt 2) ? 'course' : 'all '+lookupResults.size()+' courses'} in full details

property.name: title
property.value: View @{(lookupResults eq null or lookupResults.size() lt 2) ? 'course' : 'all '+lookupResults.size()+' courses'} in full details

property.name: render
property.value: @{lookupResults ne null and lookupResults.size() gt 0 ? true : false}

property.name: render
property.value: @{lookupResults ne null and lookupResults.size() gt 0 ? false : true}

property.name: style
property.value: margin-top:1px; font-size:0.8462em; height:25px; line-height:25px; padding:0 5px; display:block; text-align:center;

bean.p:label: Last Offered
bean.p:render: @{courseDetails.lastOffered ne null and courseDetails.courseOfferingInstitutionList.size() eq 0 ? true : false}
@{(courseDetails.backupList.size() eq 0 and courseDetails.plannedList.size() eq 0 and courseDetails.savedItemId eq null and courseDetails.academicTerms.size() eq 0) ? true : false}
@{(courseDetails.backupList.size() eq 0 and courseDetails.plannedList.size() eq 0 and courseDetails.savedItemId ne null and courseDetails.academicTerms.size() eq 0) ? true : false}
@{(courseDetails.backupList.size() gt 0 or courseDetails.plannedList.size() gt 0 or courseDetails.savedItemId ne null or courseDetails.academicTerms.size() gt 0) ? true : false}

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:label: Document is accurate at the time of creation

bean.p:messageText: This is an advising tool used to plan degree progress. This is not a UW transcript and does not reflect credit earned, transfer work, or AP/IB/CBE credit.
Any alteration, modification, or misrepresentation of this planning tool or any copy thereof may constitute a felony and/or lead to student disciplinary sanctions.

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:messageText: "Shared" plans are viewable by all UW advisers. "Private" plans are only viewable by you.
May not eligible for Financial Aid
